column4: Hi, i downloaded the iso 32 bit  from ubuntu 10.04 and when it tries to boot i'm getting a uncompression error system halted, any ideas ? :)
md5 the iso ? burn at low speed then do the disk integrity check?
the md5 is fine, and i tryed to use it with virtual box (to discard the burns erros) and getting the same error
yes, the difference is that i'm not upgrading, =)
